items.storedescription: Red Window Film Tape 1/2" X 60'. Take care of your film with this factory certified tape.

The Black Flock Window Guide Tape prevents scratching of film from hard window guides. More and more manufacturers are using hard plastic guides against windows. These guides can scratch even the highest quality films. This felt tape can be applied to guides to prevent scratching. The fully weather-able tape is great for long lasting protection. Don't get caught without it.   1.5 inch x 50ft
items.storedisplayname2: Felt Window Guide Tape - Black Flock (50ft)

items.storedescription: Place the Door Upholstery Remover tool under edge of the door upholstery panel, insert into the fastener as far as possible and simply pry up. Large, comfortable handle.
The 8" Circle Template is used for cutting precise holes in film to fit cleanly around circular hinge bolts and other hardware found on vent wings and swing-out rear quarter windows.
The 12" Circle Template is used for cutting precise holes in film to fit cleanly around circular hinge bolts and other hardware found on vent wings and swing-out rear quarter windows.
The 48" Ruler is a commercial grade rulers for a variety of uses. Smooth, straight edges for precise cuts.
The 60" Ruler is a commercial grade ruler for a variety of uses. Smooth, straight edges for precise cuts.
The 72" Ruler is a commercial grade ruler for a variety of uses. Smooth, straight edges for precise cuts.

For mirrors held on by spring clip. To remove, you need to pry up from under the bottom edge. Place this tool under the bottom edge of the windshield where it attaches to the bracket and push the tool toward the glass. This motion will pry the mirror up and off of the bracket. Made in USA.

Remove mirrors from Ford/Honda products with ease. Simply slide the blade between the mirror bracket and the mirror. A gentle rocking motion with the tool, using upward pressure, will dislodge the mirror. Made in USA.

The pocket sized All-In-One Mirror Tool has 6 devices that work on a wide range of foreign and domestic vehicles. The MT228 features #2 Phillips, T15, & T20 drivers as well as hook and pick devices that are perfect for loosening, prying, aligning & unfas-tening tabs & snaps. Additionally, the All-In-One Mirror Tool includes a spring-latch mirror device for removing mirrors on Ford vehicles built after 2004. By simply placing the spring-latch mirror device against the glass at the base of the mirror and tapping the tool with a rubber mallet you can compress the spring-latch and effortlessly slide the mirror off the button.

Remove mirrors from Ford products with ease. Simply slide the blade between the mirror bracket and the mirror. A gentle rocking motion with the tool, using upward pressure, will dislodge the mirror. Made in USA.
Cover up those embarrassing light gaps with this wonderful 1" blackout vinyl.   (1" X 150')

items.storedescription: The Equalizer Heatwave Heat Gun is compact, lightweight, easy to use heat gun is perfect for shrinking back windows. With temperature settings of 570° F and 1050° F, your work will be done in no time.

items.storedescription: The Furno 300 dual temperature heat gun is a versatile tool for dozens of applications. Two temperature settings: 750°F and 1100°F 1200 Watts/4100 BTUs Ergonomic design for comfort and balance to reduce fatigue. Side bars prevent the hot nozzle from touching the work surface. Integrated stand for safe hands-free operation. Hanging loop for storage.
items.storedisplayname2: Wagner Furno 300 Dual Temp Heat Gun

items.storedescription: WAGNER DIGITAL HEAT GUN A2910 NEW Digital circuitry provides multiple benefits. Touch-pads activate 12 distinct temperature settings from 250° to 1350° F. enabling you to match the correct temperature to the application. The digital circuitry also provides “logic” to the HT3500. When the “cool” setting is selected, the gun will cool itself to a preset temperature and automatically turn itself off.

The latest product from Fusion tools (the company that brought you favorites like the "hand job") now brings you the only heat gun with the slogan "get fluxed" actually printed on the box. This heat gun gets hot quickly and gets your shrink done right. Includes after burn tape to keep you and the cars you are tinting extra safe.

Hold your material in place with these strong neodymium magnets. With 25 lbs. of pull, you will keep graphics firmly in place. Move quickly and easily re-positioning your graphics, saving time and money. Each includes a Magnetic Shield™ to prevent unwanted attraction of tools during storage.

Hold your material in place with these strong neodymium magnets. These heavy duty magnets are designed for the wrap industry. The longer post makes the removal of the magnet easier than traditional magnets. These magnets have a 25lb pull and are coated with a mild coating for vehicle protection.

Now you have a great alternative to an expensive and heavy Filmhandler. The 36" Clean Cut Box Slitter Cut Off Bar drops right into the box of 36" film sitting on the end caps and secured by the box itself. With a magnetic strip underneath the bar you can quickly and easily move Clean Cut Cutter Heads between the different size bars.  Each component of the CLEAN CUT BOX SLITTER SYSTEM is sold separately so you can choose your desired length bar and the quantity of cutter-head assemblies you desire. MADE IN THE USA

items.storedescription: The CLEAN CUT BOX TRAY was designed to get the film up off the floor and it also holds the box when you pull your film out. The CLEAN CUT BOX TRAY is really easy to set up. Place the tray on the top of the ladder to mark where the mounting hole will be. Drill out the mounting hole in the top of the ladder with the appropriate sized drill bit. Set the two nuts at the stop distance on the eyeball bolt. Tighten until the top of the bolt pops through the mounting hole. Place the box with the CLEAN CUT BAR facing you. Each component of the CLEAN CUT BOX SLITTER SYSTEM is sold separately so you can choose your desired length bar and the quantity of cutter-head assemblies you desire. MADE IN THE USA

With a magnetic attachment system the Clean Cut Cutter Head Assembly can quickly be moved between the various bar sizes to provide factory clean cuts on the film right out of the box. With a special carbon etched blade that will provide crisp clean cuts for up to a year before needing replaced the Clean Cut Box Slitter System provides a lighter and cheaper alternative to the Filmhandler.     Each component of the CLEAN CUT BOX SLITTER SYSTEM is sold separately so you can choose your desired length bar and the quantity of cutter-head assemblies you desire. MADE IN THE USA

The Clean Cut Cutter Head Assembly Replacement Blades give you peace of mind to allow your Clean Cut Box Slitter System to provide years of cutting without the worry of rough edges on your film. Each component of the CLEAN CUT BOX SLITTER SYSTEM is sold separately so you can choose your desired length bar and the quantity of cutter-head assemblies you desire. MADE IN THE USA
items.storedisplayname2: Clean Cut Cutter Head Assembly Replacement Blades (5/pk)

items.storedescription: Filmhandler Replacement Blades to be used in the Filmhandler Cutter Heads.

The Filmhandler Cutter Head Assembly is a complete cutting unit for the Filmhandler.  If you want to make more then two cuts on the Filmhandler or one of your other cutters has broken you need to have the entire Filmhandler Cutter Head Assembly.
Filmhandler Blade Holder is the top part of the cutting system for the Filmhandler. To work in the Filmhandler you would still need to have the bottom mounting bracket.
The Filmhandler 3" Cutter Shims 1/4" Thick are sold separately. Keep your film in line with this 1/4" shim.

items.storedescription: Repair Kit for your Film Handler.

Minimize waste, improve efficiency and make more money with the popular Film Handler. This slitter makes precise horizontal and vertical cuts on rolls up to 72" in width. You can easily mount the film handler on a wall or ladder in your shop, keeping film clean and off the floor. Many installers take their film handlers on location, just load it in your truck and leave a lasting professional impression with your clients. *Considered oversize and will have additional shipping & handling charges

The Jiffy J2W Portable Steamer is a multi-purpose steamer that incorporates many of the same components found in the more powerful J4000W steamer, and with proper maintenance, the J2W will provide years of service. Steam is a tremendous help for the removal of window film on rear windows. You will not believe how much steam helps in the installation of paint protection film! Features:
- 7 1/2 foot flexible hose with a curved metal pipe head with handle 
- Quick 2-minute heat-up time      
- 1300 watt heating element die cast in solid brass 
- Impact resistant 1-gallon water reservoir
- Over 2 hours of steam per filling
- 360 degree swivel casters for mobility

Jiffy® Steamer supplies a selection of steam heads that are compatible and interchangeable with most "J" series model Jiffy® Steamers. This configuration consists of a 9-inch curved aluminum pipe head with a wooden handle. Available on the J-4000W Pro-Line Series Model with a 7.5 foot hose length.

The Jiffy J4000W Professional Steamer is Jiffy® Steamer’s most powerful model designed for commercial purposes. Steam is a tremendous help for the removal of window film on rear windows...You will not believe how much steam helps in the installation of paint protection film! Features: - 7 1/2 foot flexible hose with a curved metal pipe head and wood handle (Wood Handle ONLY FOR THE J4000W) - Durable die cast aluminum outer housing unit - Built-in water level sight gauge - Convenient PREHEAT and STEAM settings - Corrosion-proof internal 304 stainless steel boiler tank - 1500 watt heating element - Over 2.0 hours of steam per filling See how to remove vinyl graphics with the new Steamblade here.
Alcohol Solution Label - 3"X5"
These lint free install gloves are a fantastic fit. Wear these when installing Wrap or PPF. Lightweight and comfortable.

***Strap in picture sold separately*** (ST0017S) Professional installers often find themselves doing acrobatics to get to their tools while working. We want to respond to the installers' needs so we present you with the Tool Bag specially designed for vinyl installers to meet their requirements. Magnetic Compartments- there are magnetic plates sown into the material to conveniently stick your installing magnets. Specially Designed Knife Compartments- 8 knife compartments with custom depths of 8 and 10 cm to make sure your knives always peek out a little. This way you can grab and return them quickly. Safe Tape Measure Holder- The tape measure holder is made of sturdy plastic to avoid inadvertent damage when you lean against a car. Mounting Tape Holder- On the bottom of the Tool Bag there is a belt with a quick release. Attach your mounting tape there to quickly grab it when you need it. Protected Against Damage- Sott's Tool Bag is especially made of industrial-grade textile material and has an elliptical shape to reduce the chance of scratching the vehicle. Sturdy Plastic Strap (**Sold Separately**)- Industrial grade strap that doesn't bend or collapse when your tool bag is filled with tools. Squeegee Pockets for Quick Access- The tool bag has 2 extra pockets with adjustable depths for squeegees that you want to grab without looking. Extra Magnetic Pocket- On the front, there is another magnetic pocket underneath the material to stick metal tools or screws or another magnet. Ideal and very clever. Special Shape- Sott's Tool bag has one large compartment in the middle for gloves, wipes, etc. It has a special shape, so it doesn't bother you by wiggling between you and the vehicle. This reduces damage-prone situations.

Sott The Squad The solution to placing and pressing down the adhesive film into corners, along vehicle trim and holes. A pair of elongated squeegees that make a BA team to make you a wrap master. Specially shaped squeegees are designed to apply any type of film in hard to reach places.  Made of durable plastic as to not break, fray, buckle, or curl easily.
A wrap installer favorite.

Cleverly designed shape to enable reach anywhere. Strong and flexible. This cleverly shaped squeegee is a must for every installer. Its different sides make it extremely practical for pushing film under rubbers, into mirror housings or around roof racks without damaging the film. Perfectly suited for use as a cleaning tool as well. Wrap a cloth around the squeegee and push it into any corner for degreasing.
Wrap Glove

Max Flux Replaceable Heating Element is the solution to your used and abused Max Flux Heat Gun by Fusion Tools. For less than half the cost of a new gun, simply unscrew the barrel of your Max Flux Heat Gun, pull out the old heating element, and plug in the new ceramic core.

Features 14oz 100% cotton duck with reflective trim 13-pocket waist apron 5 pockets for larger tools & cell phone 8 pockets for pens, pencils, and small tools Dual handle or squeegee loops THIS IS THE TOOL APRON THAT INSTALLERS HAVE BEEN ASKING FOR.
